org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.service

Class ApplicationServiceFactoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.service.ApplicationServiceFactoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApplicationServiceFactory

    public final class ApplicationServiceFactoryImpl
extends Object
implements ApplicationServiceFactory
    This implementation of ApplicationServiceFactory is used as an alternative to the Guice factory for ApplicationService. We do not have Guice support in the Client SDK and as such have to construct this class using reflection.
    Since:
    13.5.0
    See Also:
    EntitlementUtils.getApplicationService(Subject, String)

      ApplicationService create(Subject subject, String realm)
      Creates a new application service instance based on the calling subject for the passed realm.
